subtitle: Backend Analyst and Developer
about_text: I am a backend developer specialized in Java, with experience in banking, insurance, and large-scale projects. I am passionate about clean code, continuous improvement, and teamwork.
work_style_text: I enjoy teamwork and believe the best ideas come from collaboration. I have been the main point of contact with clients and have taken part in recruiting and onboarding new developers.
